member.name: T:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Billable_BookingTotalStatus
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to --declare = @booking_id bigint = 9705 SELECT COUNT(p.list) total_send, p.status FROM ( SELECT id AS list, status FROM booking_package WHERE status IN ('SEND','OK') AND booking_id = @booking_id UNION ALL SELECT id AS list, status FROM booking_ticket WHERE booking_id = @booking_id AND booking_package_id IS NULL AND status IN ('SEND','OK', 'PACKAGE') UNION ALL SELECT id AS list, status FROM booking_hotel WHERE booking_id = @booking_id AND booking_package_id IS NULL AND status IN ('SEND','OK', 'PACK [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Billable_PaymentDetailCost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to --declare @billable_detail_id bigint = 10338 SELECT ISNULL(SUM(pd.cost*p.currency_rate),0) AS cost FROM payment_detail AS pd INNER JOIN payment AS p ON p.id = pd.payment_id LEFT JOIN pay_by AS pb ON pb.id = p.pay_by_id WHERE booking_billable_detail_id=@billable_detail_id AND pb.description NOT IN('VOID').

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Booking_BillableNameAddress
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to --declare @id Bigint = 11346 SELECT ( CASE WHEN s.id>0 THEN s.name ELSE ISNULL(c.initial_name,'')+' '+(CASE WHEN ISNULL(c.billing_name, '')<>'' THEN c.billing_name ELSE c.name END) END ) AS billable_name, ( CASE WHEN s.id>0 THEN ISNULL(s.address,'') ELSE (CASE WHEN ISNULL(c.billing_address, '')<>'' THEN c.billing_address ELSE c.address END) END ) AS billable_address, b.sub_agent_id, b.customer_id FROM booking b LEFT JOIN sub_agent s ON s.id=b.sub_agent_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.id=b.custo [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Booking_TotalCostTotalPrice
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to /*declare IN bigint = 3360 */
SELECT * FROM ( /* TICKET */
SELECT 'Ticket' AS product, bp.id as ref_id, bp.supplier_id, ISNULL(bp.booking_package_id,-1) as package_id, bp.status, ISNULL(bp.ad_cost+bp.ch_cost+bp.inf_cost+bp.ad_tax+bp.ch_tax+bp.inf_tax,0) AS cost, ISNULL(bp.ad_price+bp.ch_price+bp.inf_price+bp.ad_tax+bp.ch_tax+bp.inf_tax,0) AS price FROM booking_ticket AS bp WHERE bp.booking_id = @booking_id UNION ALL
/* HOTEL*/ SELECT 'Hotel' AS product, bp.id as ref_id, bp.supplier_id, ISNU [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Booking_TotalPayment
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to --declare @booking_id bigint = 9705 SELECT SUM(ISNULL(pd.cost,0) * ISNULL(p.currency_rate,1)) AS cost FROM payment_detail AS pd INNER JOIN payment AS p ON p.id = pd.payment_id LEFT JOIN pay_by AS pb ON pb.id = p.pay_by_id WHERE pd.booking_id=@booking_id AND pb.description NOT IN('VOID')
.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ConnectionB2B
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to server=db2.ns.co.th;database={0};uid={1};pwd={2};.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ConnectionExcel
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Provider=Microsoft.ACE.OLEDB.12.0; Data Source='{0}'; Extended Properties='Excel 12.0;HDR=Yes;IMEX=1'.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ConnectionMBOS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to server=db3.ns.co.th;database={0};uid={1};pwd={2};.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ConnectionNEW
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Data Source=(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS_LIST=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST={0})(PORT={1})))(CONNECT_DATA=(SID = HIIGTEST))); User Id={2};Password={3};.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ConnectionOLD
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to provider=sqloledb; data source={0}; initial catalog={1}; user id={2}; password={3} connect timeout=30;.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.DefaultCustomerEmail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT * FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN i.sub_agent_id = -1 OR ISNULL(i.sub_agent_id,0)=0 THEN ISNULL(cus.email,'') ELSE ISNULL(sa.email,'') END AS email, 'i' doc FROM invoice i LEFT JOIN customer cus ON i.customer_id = cus.id LEFT JOIN sub_agent sa ON i.sub_agent_id = sa.id WHERE i.invoice_no = @no UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN i.sub_agent_id = -1 OR ISNULL(i.sub_agent_id,0)=0 THEN ISNULL(cus.email,'') ELSE ISNULL(sa.email,'') END AS email, 'r' doc FROM receipt i LEFT JOIN customer cus ON i.customer_id = cus [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.DefaultCustomerSMS
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT (CASE s.name WHEN 'WALK IN' THEN ISNULL(c.tel,'') ELSE ISNULL(s.tel,'') END) AS tel FROM invoice i LEFT JOIN sub_agent s ON s.id=i.sub_agent_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.id=i.customer_id WHERE invoice_no=@no UNION ALL SELECT (CASE s.name WHEN 'WALK IN' THEN ISNULL(c.tel,'') ELSE ISNULL(s.tel,'') END) AS tel FROM receipt i LEFT JOIN sub_agent s ON s.id=i.sub_agent_id LEFT JOIN customer c ON c.id=i.customer_id WHERE receipt_no=@no
.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.INSERT_err_message
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO /*[GLOBAL]*/err_message (system_date, company_code, err_msg, err_page) VALUES(GETDATE(), @company_code, @err_msg, @err_page).

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.INSERT_login_history
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO /*[GLOBAL]*/login_history ([system_date],[comp_code],[user_code],[ip],[mac],[browser],[os],[status],[user_agent]) VALUES(GETDATE(),@com_code,@user_code,@ip,@mac,@browser,@os,@status,@user_agent).

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Invoice_ListUpdateCost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT MIN(id2.id) AS id, id2.invoice_id, MAX(id2.linked_to) AS linked_to, id2.booking_billable_detail_id, SUM(id2.price) as price FROM ( SELECT invoice_id, booking_billable_detail_id FROM invoice_detail WHERE booking_billable_detail_id in ( SELECT bd.id FROM invoice_detail AS id INNER JOIN booking_billable_detail AS bd ON bd.id = id.booking_billable_detail_id WHERE id.linked_record='N' /*PRODUCT_ID*/ ) ) AS id1 LEFT JOIN invoice_detail AS id2 ON id1.booking_billable_detail_id= id2.b [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ITEM_BeginNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT TOP 1 {0} FROM start_number WHERE [year]='{1}' AND ([month]='' OR [month]='{2}') ORDER BY [month] DESC.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ITEM_GetLastInvoiceNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT TOP 1 invoice_no FROM invoice WHERE invoice_no LIKE '{0}%' and invoice_type ='{1}' ORDER BY invoice_no DESC.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ITEM_GetLastPaymentNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT TOP 1 payment_no FROM payment WHERE payment_no LIKE '{0}%' ORDER BY payment_no DESC.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ITEM_GetLastReceiptNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT TOP 1 receipt_no FROM receipt WHERE receipt_no LIKE '{0}%' and receipt_type ='{1}' ORDER BY receipt_no DESC.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ITEM_GetLastTaxAirlineNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT TOP 1 tax_no FROM tax_airline WHERE tax_no LIKE '{0}%' ORDER BY tax_no DESC.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.ITEM_GetLastTaxNo
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT TOP 1 tax_no FROM tax WHERE tax_no LIKE '{0}%' ORDER BY tax_no DESC.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.Receipt_TotalPrice
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT SUM(receipt_amount) FROM view_amount_inv2rec WHERE receipt_status NOT IN('VOID','WAIT') AND booking_id = @booking_id.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SELECT_BillableDetail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT bd.id FROM booking_billable_detail bd INNER JOIN booking_billable bb ON bb.id = bd.booking_billable_id WHERE bd.{0}.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SELECT_BillableTotalCost
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT (cost*currency_rate) AS cost FROM booking_billable_detail {0} AND status NOT IN('CANCEL').

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SELECT_InitialSMS
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT TOP 1 sms_user_id, sms_user, sms_password, sms_default_number FROM /*[GLOBAL]*/initial.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SELECT_permission
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT '#' + CONVERT(VARCHAR,ISNULL(permission_id,'')) FROM staff_permission WHERE staff_id=@staff_id FOR XML PATH('').

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SELECT_permission_id
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT id FROM /*[GLOBAL]*/permission WHERE index_name='{0}'.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SELECT_SiteCustomer
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT code, database_name FROM travox_global.travoxmos.site_customer WHERE [status]='ACTIVE' OR status_hotel='ACTIVE'.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SELECT_UI_AutoComplate
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to WITH LimitRow AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY tb./*_NAME_*/ /*_ORDER_*/) AS row, * FROM (/*_SQL_QUERY_*/) tb ) SELECT * FROM LimitRow WHERE row BETWEEN @start AND @finish ORDER BY row ASC.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.SysSession_Login
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to INSERT INTO sys_session.login (created_date, expired_date, username, session_id, ipv4_address) VALUES(@created @expired, @user_code, @sessionid, @ip).

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.UPDATE_InvoiceDetail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UPDATE invoice_detail SET cost=@cost,price=@price,display_price=@price WHERE id=@id.

member.name: P:H2GEngine.My.Resources.Resources.UPDATE_ReceiptDetail
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to UPDATE receipt_detail SET cost=@cost,price=@price,receipt_amt=@price,receipt_amt1=@price WHERE id=@id.
